fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Attack a player and protect another

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Attacked players will die at the end of the following night unless they are one vite away from being lynched
- Bleeding players will be aware they are bleeding, and if they are lynched all players that did not vote them will be super-roleblocked the following night
- Protected players gain a silent vote immunity the following day, if they were attempted to be lynched the day will still end
- You have 0 uses of attacking and gain one for every player protected
